entityExtensionTemplates.name: Verra Project
entityExtensionTemplates.description: This extension provides the Verra Registry Project data needed for interaction with the Registry and Project Portal

entityExtensionTemplates.name: VM0049 Options
entityExtensionTemplates.description: This extension records the VM0049 options that will apply to all formula and variables for the module that are specific to each option.

entityExtensionTemplates.name: VMD0059 Options

entityExtensionTemplates.name: VT0013 Options
entityExtensionTemplates.description: This extension records the VT0013, Differentiating Reductions and Removals in CCS Projects, options that will apply to all formula and variables for the module that are specific to each option.

entityExtensionTemplates.name: Variable Template Options
entityExtensionTemplates.description: This extension applies to Variable Templates to record module specific options that can include or exclude variables based on the options selected.
